solution_02_probability/01_overview/q7_winlose_v2

video

\[P(WW) = 0.31 \times 0.62 = 0.1922 \] \[P(LL) = 0.69 \times 0.38 = 0.2622 \] \[P(WL) = 0.31\times 0.38 = 0.1178 \] \[P(LW) = 0.69\times 0.62 = 0.4278\]


  1. Win,win: 0.31 * 0.62 = 0.1922
  2. Lose,lose: (1-0.31) * (1-0.62) = 0.2622
  3. WL or LW: 1-0.1922-0.2622 = 0.5456
